page.title: 06Hobbies
page.content: From our questionnaire it appears that many more people do non-sporting hobbies than sporting probably because there more older people in the area who are less energetic, also there are less facilities than in larger areas. The most popular sporting hobby is swimming, followed by cricket and tennis. There were 17 different sporting hobbies listed. The most popular non-sporting hobby is gardening, followed by reading and walking and winemaking. There were 75 non-sporting hobbies listed on the questionnaires. We were surprised that T>V> was not as popular as we expected it to be.
